de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap

Class Heap<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap.Heap<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Element type. Should be Comparable or a Comparator needs to be given.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TopBoundedHeap, UpdatableHeap

    public class Heap<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic in-memory heap structure. Closely related to a PriorityQueue, but here we can override methods to obtain e.g. a TopBoundedHeap Additionally, this heap is built lazily: if you first add many elements, then poll the heap, it will be bulk-loaded in O(n) instead of iteratively built in O(n log n). This is implemented via a simple validTo counter.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
